title: The Urban Legend comic book title - spurless monoline sans/unicase sheard terminals
author: Frode Bo Helland

comments.content: It's **[CCEuphoria (Solid)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114753/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/Euphoria-p/dl227.htm)** by JG and Eric Eng Wong [2001 Active Images/Comicraft, www.comicbookfonts.com]
Fivos, you are the man for the tough odd ones, good call.

Thanks Bob :-)  
I'm just a poor software engineer still trying to figure out  
how I trapped myself in this font-id-mania business,  
he he

IDs in the ID section please!

hhp
Hrant. I used the new Font ID link in the right hand menu. The old Type ID forum was marked as defunct.
